description: Do you love the taste of a classic&nbsp;Margarita? How about one with an added twist? This recipe for Frozen Coconut Margaritas is something that will satisfy any sweet tooth! The coconut flavor provides a unique and delicious twist on this classic cocktail.
name: Frozen Coconut Margarita

recipeInstructions.name: Place cream of coconut, tequila, triple sec, and lime juice in a blender.
recipeInstructions.text: Place cream of coconut, tequila, triple sec, and lime juice in a blender.

recipeInstructions.name: Add ice. Cover and blend until smooth.
recipeInstructions.text: Add ice. Cover and blend until smooth.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour into prepared glass and garnish with a lime wedge and additional coconut.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour into prepared glass and garnish with a lime wedge and additional coconut.
